advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved entitlements.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to inject code into sensitive binaries bundled with Xcode
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by forcing hardened runtime on the affected binaries at the system level.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to observe unprotected user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.impact: An unauthenticated user may be able to access recently printed documents
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed app may be able to collect system logs
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved entitlements.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Meysam Firouzi @R00tkitsmm working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive kernel state
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A sandboxed app may be able to observe system-wide network connections
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Eloi Benoist-Vanderbeken (@elvanderb) from Synacktiv (@Synacktiv) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An app may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Jonathan Bar Or of Microsoft, Anurag Bohra of Microsoft, and Michael Pearse of Microsoft

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved file handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a 3D model may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a 3D model may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Parsing an office document may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Holger Fuhrmannek of Deutsche Telekom Security GmbH on behalf of BSI (German Federal Office for Information Security)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to retain access to system configuration files even after its permission is revoked
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Yiğit Can YILMAZ (@yilmazcanyigit), Jeff Johnson, Koh M. Nakagawa of FFRI Security, Inc., Kirin (@Pwnrin), and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.
